zuul.withenums.v2
Class Character

java.lang.Object
  zuul.withenums.v2.Character

public class Character
extends java.lang.Object

This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application. "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game. A "Character" represents one person in the scenery of the game. He can give you some indication.

Version:
25.10.2011
Author:
Nolan Potier
